title: Script Font Help please
content:
Hi,

Does anyone know what this is please?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Type.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907165022/http:/typophile.com/files/Type_2.jpg) | 39.05 KB |

 [‹ Club Med logo typeface](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907165022/http:/www.typophile.com/node/46371 "Go to previous forum topic") [Vimeo Logo Script ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907165022/http:/www.typophile.com/node/46372 "Go to next forum topic")
author: perkynana

comments.content: Similar to Bickley Script, but that’s not it.

I think this is hand lettered although it is difficult to tell at this size & it would be nice to know the age of the image. The two a’s are quite different & although the t’s look similar at this scale a larger size might show subtle differences. Also the wider spacing & slightly larger size on the left compared to the right makes me think if this is a digital font it has been very carefully tweaked by someone with a good knowledge of hand lettering.
